'''''Lennék én folyóvíz''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to connect with the Oceanid's consciousness during the {{Quest|Like the Faint Moonlight of Yesteryear}}.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to a poem titled ''Lennék én folyóvíz...'' by Hungarian poet {{Lang|hu={{w|Sándor Petőfi}}|mini=1}}. The title translates to "I would be river water..."
